item.title: How to be a great intern?
item.description: Tips and suggestions to make the most of an internship in tech. Iâ€™ve worked with many talented interns at throughtout my career and I wanted to share some general suggestions that might help you to improve your internship. Note: My experience is with research internships where the final outcome could be a paper submission. Expectations The first key aspect to understand are the expectations of your internship (both for you and your supervisor).
